segments.text: I would like to return this book .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I do anything else for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would also like to check out this magazine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ’ t let you do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our policy doesn ’ t allow anyone to check out the magazines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What things am I allowed to check out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are only allowed to check out books or videos .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really need to check out this magazine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , but that ’ s our policy .
segments.speaker: S1
